job_purpose: Join a market leader in an exciting period of expansion as a Senior Fullstack Developer in East Perth, working on greenfield projects and mentoring junior team members.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Work across front-end (React) and back-end (Java, Spring Boot) technologies
Participate in all stages of the software development lifecycle
Mentor junior team members and conduct code reviews
Develop new code and provide maintenance and support
Collaborate with a dedicated team of developers
required_qualifications: Experience in REST API design and implementation
Mobile development experience is a bonus
End to end project lifecycle experience
Great presentation and strong communication skills
company_details: The company prides itself on its culture and the long tenure of its team members. The successful applicant will have the opportunity to work in a supportive team environment with the option to work from home 1 day a week.
